    Method
    Description

    Methods in database that return types with arguments of type ElectricVehicle
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ArrayList<ElectricVehicle>
    ElectricVehicleDB.select()
    Displays all vehicles in the database using the SQL command Select.
    static ArrayList<ElectricVehicle>
    ElectricVehicleDB.sort()
    Displays and sorts all vehicles in the database by mileage efficiency using the SQL command Select and Order By.
